# PED::CLEAR_PED_BLOOD_DAMAGE_BY_ZONE

## Summary
Clears the blood damage that has been applied to the specified ped on the specified zone

## Parameters
* **PED_INDEX** pedIndex: The index of the ped to clear the decoration decal from.
* **PED_DECORATION_ZONE** zone: The zone on the ped that needs cleared.

## Description
<!-- AUTOGENERATED: Remove this line before editing -->
Somehow related to changing ped's clothes.
